title: Unified View seems empty?
creator: roy.weisfeld
content:
Hey,

For some reason Unified View seems empty, when accessing emails seperatly it works fine though.

Have tried restarting. Fiddling with settings and clearing cache and it doesn't help.

Also this has been the same since a few previous versions so I can't pinpoint a specific update that broke it, has always been the case for me.

App Version: version 10.0 net.thunderbird.android

Android Version: 15

Phone: Pixel 9 pro XL

title: When will Thunderbird for Android be able to move mails between accounts?
creator: marco.piantino
content:
Is there any indication as to when Thunderbird for Android will be able to move mails between accounts?

Many thanks in advance for an replies.
